 Instead of wasting lots of money, time and efforts to eliminate a hypothetic nuclear threat that is allegedly issuing from Iraq, GB better make efforts to eliminate the inner threat of mass annihilation weapons spread. The same with a nuclear bomb. Second, it is not necessary to make a nuclear device. It is quite enough to make a "dirty bomb" that will also cause deathly after-effects impossible to prevent.
 Now bring back in mind the thousands of Moslems from Pakistan, Afghanistan, Saudi Arabia, Chechnya, Albania and Kosovo! Who can prevent the lost plutonium from coming to their hands? Who can prevent them from making a "dirty bomb" to retaliate upon Great Britain for its part in the war in Iraq?
